abstract: Pres Obama announces that two longtime Guantanamo Bay detainees, Abdul Rahman Ahmed and Omar Hamzayavich Abdulayev, have been transferred to Serbia.
lead_paragraph: The transfers underscored President Obama’s effort to release detainees on a list of those recommended for transfer under certain conditions.

headline.main: 2 Guantánamo Bay Prisoners Are Transferred to Serbia
headline.print_headline: 2 Guantánamo Prisoners Are Transferred to Serbia

snippet: The transfers underscored President Obama’s effort to release detainees on a list of those recommended for transfer under certain conditions....
